question:
[Faye] baked a cake for her son [Thomas]. For her daughter, [Christine], [Faye] made some fudge brownies. [Julie] was happy to babysit her niece, [Cecil]. [Cecil] was a great child. [Gregory]'s daughter [Cecil] was playing on the swings in the park. [Christine], his other daughter, was napping in the stroller. [Christopher] and his sister [Christine] went out for ice cream. [Cecil] and [Thomas] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Christine] and her sister, [Cecil], frequently bicker. However, they always make up quickly.
Question: How is [Julie] related to [Christopher]?
